column5: Howdy! Welcome to Richmond, Texas!  Private entrance, small studio. **Ask me where the key is!** -WIFI/Small Flat Screen TV-9572 channels/Small Fridge/Microwave -Full bathroom with shower/no bathtub. -Relax, visit the ponds and green wooded areas, take a walk!  -Distances: *55 miles-Airport IAH Bush  *30 miles-Hobby Airport *31 miles-Medical Center (Houston) & The Galleria *16 miles- SugarLand  *15 miles- Katy Mills Mall near I10 Freeway.
column8: Private studio! "The Ivy" Queen Bed/Full Bath
